summary: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.
cast: Robert De Niro|Jean Reno|Natascha McElhone|Stellan Skarsgård|Sean Bean|Skipp Sudduth|Michael Lonsdale|Jan Tríska|Jonathan Pryce|Ron Perkins|Féodor Atkine|Katarina Witt|Bernard Bloch|Dominic Gugliametti|Alan Beckworth|Daniel Breton|Amidou|Tolsty|Gérard Moulévrier|Lionel Vitrant|Vincent Schmitt|Léopoldine Serre|Lou Maraval|Frédéric Schmalzbauer|Julia Maraval|Laurent Spielvogel|Ron Jeremy|Steve Suissa|Katia Tchenko|Dyna Gauzy|Lilly-Fleur Pointeaux|Amanda Spencer|Dimitri Rafalsky|Vladimir Tchernine|Gérard Touratier|Cyril Prentout|Henry Moati|Christophe Maratier|Pierre Forest|Nader Boussandel|Hélène Cardona|Lee Delong|Norbert Ferrer|Veronique Blanc Meyere|Christine Musset|Chuck Riley
title: Ronin
